title: Workout
creator_credit: Rhonda Small and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: An impressionistic study of the relationship between horse and rider during a work out. To compete in Olympic equestrian events young riders must practice daily, sharpening their own skill and that of their horses. Shows the world as it must appear to horse and rider on a foggy morning in the Australian bush.
